reference_a:
@article{barkalifa2020,
  title = {Using network analysis for examining interpersonal emotion dynamics},
  author = {Bar-Kalifa, Eran and Sened, Haran},
  date = {2020-03-03},
  journaltitle = {Multivariate Behavioral Research},
  volume = {55},
  number = {2},
  eprint = {31179758},
  eprinttype = {pubmed},
  pages = {211--230},
  publisher = {Routledge},
  issn = {0027-3171},
  doi = {10.1080/00273171.2019.1624147}
}
topics: relationships, emotion dynamics, interpersonal, mood, relationship satisfaction, pregnancy, childbirth
sampling_scheme: 1x/day in the evening 1 hour before sleep, or completing the next day
participants: heterosexual Israeli couples expecting a child (not twins)
additional_comments: sample 2 in the paper, eight pre-excluded by authors due to missingnes

features.name: men_anxiety
features.coding: Sum score for the man for 3 anxiety items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: men_sadness
features.coding: Sum score for the man for 3 sadness items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: men_vigor
features.coding: Sum score for the man for 3 vigor items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: men_contentment
features.coding: Sum score for the man for 3 contentment items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: women_anxiety
features.coding: Sum score for the woman for 3 anxiety items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: women_sadness
features.coding: Sum score for the woman for 3 sadness items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: women_vigor
features.coding: Sum score for the woman for 3 vigor items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states

features.name: women_contentment
features.coding: Sum score for the woman for 3 vigor items from the adapted shortened daily diary version of the Profile of Mood states
